credit_line: Gift of Mr. Eric and Mrs. Sylvia Elsesser, The Trude Guermonprez Archives
title: Trude and John as Landscape, study for the Tapestry "Our Mountains"
medium: Brush and green, blue and yellow watercolor over graphite on white wove paper
description: Mountainous landscape incorporating the reclining profile face of John Elsesser (the artist's second husband), facing right, to create the mountain peaks and the profile face of Trude Guermonprez, facing left, to form the hills beneath.  Design is bordered in graphite.
name: Drawing
